Name: Mech Troid
About the game: MechTroid is a sci-fi themed shooter, the gameplay consists of shooting your way through the levels getting upgrades as you go and learning the different enemy types like many arcade classics. this game features 8 increasingly difficult levels with varying enemy types that will keep you on your toes.
